Description: Returns 25 health points to the player, by default. The additional health will be drained by one point every two seconds if it's over the limit.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Custom health points to give player instead of default ones.
Amount of health points over the maximum armor limit this item can provide.

Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it. Only 'On' and 'Toggle' trigger use-types are accepted which makes item be picked up by player '!activator'. Kill-targeting this entity will remove {{ entname }} and stop it from respawning.
Entity to trigger when item is picked up. Trigger use-type is 'Toggle'.

Notes: As all weapon-, ammo- and item- entities, this respawns after 15 seconds.

If "Touch only" and "Use only" flags are selected, the item can only be collected by trigger. When those flags are not selected, item also can be collected by trigger, but only if player is the !activator.
